E

expect(T) - Static method in class com.pholser.lambspec.Subject
Establishes the given object as a test subject, against which expectations can be set.
expectAtLeastOneOf(Iterable<T>) - Static method in class com.pholser.lambspec.Subject
Establishes elements of the given sequence as test subjects, at least one of which must meet subsequent expectations.
expectEachOf(Iterable<T>) - Static method in class com.pholser.lambspec.Subject
